question.text: You are driving on a motorway. There is a slow-moving vehicle ahead. On the back you see this sign. You should

explanation.text: If a vehicle displaying this sign is in your lane you will have to pass it on the left. Use your mirrors and signal. When it’s safe move into the lane on your left. You should always look well ahead so that you can spot any hazards early, giving yourself time to react safely.
